channel.title: How do i add a button to my forums?
channel.description:
how do i add a button to my forums where if you click it you go to another site?
heres my forums i would like it to go after shop. http://fleamutt.com/graphicsco/index.php

item.source: How do i add a button to my forums?

item.title: How do i add a button to my forums?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

First, Install “custom actions” modification (search for it on the smf site).

Then tell me what you want the tab to be called

Then upload your index.template.php to a file hosting site then pm me the link and ill add a tab to it, i re-upload the index.template.php then you re-upload it to your ftp.

Then in “features and options” go to the custom action option make a new action called whatever you wanted me to call the tab then select the html feature and put this in the box

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a button to my forums?
